title: shippingRatesPerItemOrWeight
description: This schema is used for setting up shipping rates that vary by number items in the order or by the weight of the order

service_level.description:
If ServiceLevel has been defined in your shipping setup and you want to set rates ServiceLevel level use this field.

			#Logic

			This message should be defined by service_level OR shipping_carrier OR shipping_method

			#Valid Values

			*'Standard'

			*'Expedited'

			*'Scheduled'

			*'NextDay'

			*'SecondDay'

shipping_carrier.description:
A shipping carrier, including all that carrier's ShippngMethods e.g. UPS, FedEx, USPS.  

			If shipping set up has defined the ShippingCarrier level and you are setting up shipping rates at the ShippingCarrier level use this field.

			#Logic

			This message should be defined by service_level OR shipping_carrier OR shipping_method

			#Valid values

			*'UPS'

			*'USPS'
			
			*'FedEx'

shipping_method.description:
A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home. If shipping set up has defined ShippingMethod level and you are setting up shipping rates at the ShippingMethod level use this field.

			#Logic

			This message should be defined by service_level OR shipping_carrier OR shipping_method

			#Valid values

			*list of valid ship methods not yet available

			*'all' - use this if the rates should be applied to all values of 'shipping_method'

merchant_order_size_upper_limit.description:
The value, in US dollars, of the upper limit of an order basket size.  The lower limit of the band will be either zero or OrderSizeUpperLimit that is just below it.  

			Enter 'infinity' for the final band which will define the charge from the largest dollar value 'merchant_order_size_upper_limit' to 'infinity'			

			#Valid values

			*'infinity'
			*A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.

shipping_charge.description:
The amount charged, in US dollars, for the given ShippingCarrier, ShippingMethod or ServiceLevel and Price Band			

			#Valid values
			
			A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.
